enrl_requirement:
Enrollment Requirements: Students who have previously taken CMN 380-7 are not eligible to retake the course.
Add Consent: Department Consent Required
title: SoC CMN 380-7-24 Junior Tutorial

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: What is a modern-day tragedy, and what is the difference between a tragedy and a drama with tragic results? In this course, students will read contemporary tragedies, complete weekly writing exercises exercises experimenting with the form, and ultimately craft an original tragedy of their own. Open to students of all levels of writing experience.

subject: CMN
